name: Delusion [Android]
description:
Attention: This game is for android so download via smartphone or bluestacks emulator!

Delusion is a short horror game inspired by Granny.

Someday you driving to your new job late at night.
After a long road, your car is out of gas but you find in the forest an old abandoned house. When you reach a door something hits your back.
Then you wake up in this house and you are not alone here.
